definition: (of a meteor etc) to streak across (the sky)/(of a searchlight, lightning etc) to play across (the sky)
to cut/to slash/to scratch (cut into the surface of sth)/to strike (a match)
to delimit/to transfer/to assign/to plan/to draw (a line)/stroke of a Chinese character
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

sentences.english: Nothing was heard in the room but the hurrying pen of the stripling.
sentences.chinese: 屋子裏悄然無聲，只有年輕人的筆匆忙劃過紙頁。

sentences.english: Silver is the tears droped from my eyes.
sentences.chinese: 銀色，是劃過臉龐的淚滴。

sentences.english: The chalk rasped across the blackboard.
sentences.chinese: 粉筆劃過黑板發出刺耳的聲音。

sentences.english: Meteor finished with the long-tail again across the dark night sky.
sentences.chinese: 說完流星帶着長長的光尾再次劃過漆黑的夜空。

sentences.english: It is a print of from a tip of stock across?
sentences.chinese: 是從筆尖劃過的一條印子嗎？

sentences.english: The lightning zigzagged through the church yard.
sentences.chinese: 閃電呈之字形劃過教堂的院子。

sentences.english: Time noiselessly once rowed in the self-discipline of seven Yans.
sentences.chinese: 時間，在七焰的修煉中悄然劃過。

sentences.english: Wringting of light assaut the darkness, more prodigious thanmeteors .
sentences.chinese: 光明的文字劃過黑暗，比流星更爲神奇。

sentences.english: To leave my spoor in the free wind .
Looking at the moon through a clear blue sky.
sentences.chinese: 看着月亮劃過澈藍天的天空。

sentences.english: The words slid from my brain, and knotted in my stomach.
sentences.chinese: 這句話劃過我的腦海，在我的胃裏糾結着。

sentences.english: How am I to cross to the other shore without taking a boat and rowing across the waters?
sentences.chinese: 我要怎樣跨到彼岸而不用乘船或者劃過水面？

sentences.english: Or a piping hot ball of fire that looked west across the sky?
sentences.chinese: 或是看着西邊那個滾熱的火球劃過天際？

sentences.english: Listen to the wind, across shallow sorrow.
Night getting deeper, bugles of some far-away barracks streaked across the sky.
sentences.chinese: 夜漸漸深了，天空劃過遠處軍營傳來的熄燈號聲。

sentences.english: Rainbow mark of Han Ya has delimited vast sky, began airborne new course of development.
sentences.chinese: 韓亞的彩虹標記劃過長空，開始了空運新里程。
